extension.name: GCalendar Next Event
extension.author: G4J Project
extension.copyright: This extension is released under the GNU/GPL License.
extension.description: This module shows the next event from a google calendar, displayed via provided html.

field.name: style_parameters
field.label: Style Parameters
field.description: Key value pairs to pass into the style.

field.name: offset
field.label: Event Order Offset
field.description: Show the event X number of events after the immediate next event

field.name: output
field.label: Event output
field.description: Here you can customize the appearance of the event.
field.content:
{y<}{yn}
{yl}{y>}{o<}{on}
{ol}{o>}{w<}{wn}
{wl}{w>}{d<}{dn}
{dl}{d>}{h<}{hn}
{hl}{h>}{m<}{mn}
{ml}{m>}{s<}{sn}
{sl}{s>}
{desc}
field.description: Here you can modify the event output. This will depend on the style you chose.

field.name: past_events
field.label: Display current events
field.description: Define whether the module should display events that are occurring now (as opposed to occurring solely in the future.)

field.name: output_now
field.label: Event Now output
field.description: Here you can customize the appearance of an event that is happening right now.
field.content: Join us at [map]

field.name: no_event
field.label: No Event Text
field.description: Customize the output when there are no events found.

field.name: find
field.label: Event Search
field.description: Find events whose title/description contain this string. Standard Google search expressions are allowed (e.g. find only me, -dont_find_me, find this that)

field.name: title_filter
field.label: Event Title Filter
field.description: Show only events with titles that match this regular expression

field.name: start_date
field.label: Start Date
field.description: Limit to events that have only started since this date (can be relative)

field.name: end_date
field.label: End Date
field.description: Limit to events that will start before date (can be relative)

field.name: max_events
field.label: Max Events
field.description: Download only the next specified number of events.

field.name: gc_cache_time
field.label: Cache Time
field.description: The time before the module is recached in sec.
